argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_axpjpj | |- ( ( H e. CH /\ A e. ~H ) -> A = ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) +h ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( H e. CH /\ A e. ~H ) -> ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) +h ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) ) = A ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( H e. CH /\ A e. ~H ) -> A e. ~H ) |
| 4 |  | #P_pjhcl | |- ( ( H e. CH /\ A e. ~H ) -> ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) e. ~H ) |
| 5 |  | #P_choccl | |- ( H e. CH -> ( _|_ ` H ) e. CH ) |
| 6 |  | #P_pjhcl | |- ( ( ( _|_ ` H ) e. CH /\ A e. ~H ) -> ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) e. ~H ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( H e. CH /\ A e. ~H ) -> ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) e. ~H ) |
| 8 |  | #P_hvsubadd | |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) e. ~H /\ ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) e. ~H ) -> ( ( A -h ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) ) = ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) <-> ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) +h ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) ) = A ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 4, 7, 8 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( H e. CH /\ A e. ~H ) -> ( ( A -h ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) ) = ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) <-> ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) +h ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) ) = A ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( H e. CH /\ A e. ~H ) -> ( A -h ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) ) = ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( H e. CH /\ A e. ~H ) -> ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) = ( A -h ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) ) ) |
